message: Fine crossing, wouldn't you say? *adjusts weathered cap* These waters have been good to me for twenty years, though the winds were tricky today. *gestures toward Rialto* I'm Niccol√≤ Barbarigo, captain of this galley. I notice you're new to our Republic - a Popolani by your colors. *leans in slightly* If you're seeking reliable transport for goods or yourself around the lagoon, my rates are fair and my knowledge of these waters unmatched. What brings you to Venice? Trade opportunities? Or perhaps you're looking to establish yourself with property near the markets?
